com.wj.android.messageviewer.io

Class AndroidMessageReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.io.AndroidMessageReader

  • public class AndroidMessageReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads and exports message xml files from Titanium Backup folder.

    Message files appear as file com.keramidas.virtual.XML_MESSAGES-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS.xml.gz in the TitaniumBackup folder on the mobile phone.

    Optionally, if a SQLLite contacts database is specified, a SQLLiteContactsReader is instantiated and used to query the contact name from thread address.

    Author:
    Werner Jaeger

    • Method Detail

      • loadMessages

        public int loadMessages(java.io.InputStream is,
               java.io.File contactsDB,
               int iTimeOffset)
        Reads a message file as stored from the Titanium Backup application.
        Parameters:
        is - the message file input stream to read from. Must not be null.
        contactsDB - the SQLLite contact database file or null.
        iTimeOffset - added to the stored GMT time in date attributes.
        Returns:
        the error code 0 meaning success.
